title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Educational Research Data Synthesis Using Network Meta-Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the fundamental principles of network meta-analysis (NMA) and its application in educational research.
Learners will be able to compare and analyze the effect sizes of various online learning designs using NMA.
Learners will be able to design formative assessments to evaluate the effectiveness of mobile-based science education programs in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
